Updated review: Valve has listened to the community and they are now trying to fight against the bot problem. The quality of casual matches on Valve's official servers has gotten way better than it was a few months ago. 
I can live with no new big content updates as long as they continue to maintain the game and not let it go downhill again. 


[strike]Dont get me wrong TF2 is a fun game and can easily be considered a "classic" PC game. 
However the big problem with it right now is that Valve has completely abandoned it despite the game still being incredibly popular. 

Casual servers are full of automated bot accounts and cheaters and there have been no major content updates since 2017.[/strike]
